ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Instrument vs. melee attacks
ygData.msgSnippet: Course the mob being DoT d will be beating on you and not a handful of bonechips while its taking it.  Not too mention the necro player doesn t have to recast
ygData.messageBody:
Course the mob being DoT'd will be beating on you and not a handful of
bonechips while its taking it. Not too mention the necro player doesn't
have to recast every six seconds.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 06, 2000 2:59 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Instrument vs. melee attacks


Incidently, the damage over time from the 3 Chants stacked is
right up there with 2-3 necro DoTs stacked, or the best DoT in
the game (shaman L49 poison).

--
John H. Kim
